articles.author: Peter Baker
articles.title: Biden Tests Negative for Coronavirus but Will Keep Isolating
articles.description: The negative test came a week after his rebound case emerged. He will remain in isolation until he tests negative a second time, his doctor said.
articles.content: The president was treated with Paxlovid early in his bout with Covid, and while the drug has been credited with great success in suppressing the virus and preventing severe cases and hospitalizations… [+1163 chars]

articles.title: Israel and Gaza militants exchange fire after deadly strikes

articles.title: Indiana passes near-total abortion ban, the first state to do so post-Roe
articles.description: The bill, which includes exceptions for rape and incest cases, was signed into law by Gov. Eric Holcomb (R) soon after passing Indiana's Republican-controlled Senate.

articles.title: Flooding in Death  Valley
articles.description: Flooding overtook several cars in California's Death Valley amid record floods that have stranded more than 1,000 people.
